languages.text: {n}Кинжал росчерками раскаленной боли выводит на лбу новые символы. Ваша кровь — кипящий свинец, нервы — ядовитые лески, а каждый вдох сотнями бритв раздирает глотку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Инквизитор вырезает символ на лбу, вода жжется изнутри.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The dagger draws more symbols on your forehead with strokes of incandescent pain. Your blood is boiling lead. Your nerves are poisoned wires. Your every breath shreds your throat like a hundred razor blades.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кинжал росчерками раскаленной боли выводит на лбу новые символы. Ваша кровь — кипящий свинец, нервы — ядовитые лески, а каждый вдох сотнями бритв раздирает глотку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The dagger draws more symbols on your forehead with strokes of incandescent pain. Your blood is boiling lead. Your nerves are poisoned angling lines. Your every breath shreds your throat like a hundred razorblades.{/n}

{n}The dagger draws more symbols on your forehead with strokes of incandescent pain. Your blood is boiling lead. Your nerves are poisoned angling lines. Your every breath shreds your throat like a hundred razorblades.{/n}

{n}The dagger draws more symbols on your forehead with strokes of incandescent pain. Your blood is boiling lead. Your nerves are poisoned fishing lines. Your every breath shreds your throat like a hundred razor blades.{/n}

{n}The dagger draws more symbols on your forehead with strokes of incandescent pain. Your blood is boiling lead. Your nerves are poisoned fishing lines. Your every breath shreds your throat like a hundred razor blades.{/n}

{n}The dagger draws more symbols on your forehead with strokes of incandescent pain. Your blood is boiling lead. Your nerves are poisoned wires. Your every breath shreds your throat like a hundred razor blades.{/n}

{n}The dagger draws more symbols on your forehead with strokes of incandescent pain. Your blood is boiling lead. Your nerves are poisoned wires. Your every breath shreds your throat like a hundred razor blades.{/n}

languages.text: {n}匕首在你额头上划下了更多印记，带着炽热的疼痛。你的血液仿佛化成了沸腾的铅，神经像是沾满了毒液的丝线。你的每一口呼吸，都在撕扯着你的喉咙，就像吞下了一百把刀片一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dagger draws more symbols on your forehead with strokes of incandescent pain. Your blood is boiling lead. Your nerves are poisoned wires. Your every breath shreds your throat like a hundred razor blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}匕首在你额头上划下了更多印记，带着炽热的疼痛。你的血液仿佛化成了沸腾的铅，神经像是沾满了毒液的鱼线。你的每一口呼吸，都会撕裂你的喉咙，就像吞下了一百把刀片一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}短剣は、あなたの額にシンボルを描き続ける。その都度、熱烈な痛みに襲われた。血液は煮えたぎる銅のようで、神経は毒性ワイヤーになったかのように感じられる。呼吸をするたび、喉を剃刀の刃が100枚通過するかのようだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dagger draws more symbols on your forehead with strokes of incandescent pain. Your blood is boiling lead. Your nerves are poisoned wires. Your every breath shreds your throat like a hundred razor blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}短剣は、あなたの額にシンボルを描き続ける。その都度、熱烈な痛みに襲われた。血液は煮えたぎる銅のようで、神経は毒性ワイヤーになったかのように感じられる。呼吸をするたび、喉を剃刀の刃が100枚通過するかのようだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La daga dibuja más símbolos en tu frente con trazos de dolor ardiente. Te hierve la sangre. Tus nervios son cables envenenados. Cada aliento te destroza la garganta como cien cuchillas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dagger draws more symbols on your forehead with strokes of incandescent pain. Your blood is boiling lead. Your nerves are poisoned wires. Your every breath shreds your throat like a hundred razor blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La daga dibuja más símbolos en tu frente con trazos de dolor ardiente. Te hierve la sangre. Tus nervios son sedales envenenados. Cada aliento te destroza la garganta como cien cuchillas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Dolch malt dir mit Pinselstrichen strahlenden Schmerzes weitere Symbole auf die Stirn. Dein Blut ist kochendes Blei. Deine Nerven sind vergiftete Drähte. Jeder deiner Atemzüge zerfetzt deine Kehle wie einhundert Rasierklingen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dagger draws more symbols on your forehead with strokes of incandescent pain. Your blood is boiling lead. Your nerves are poisoned wires. Your every breath shreds your throat like a hundred razor blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Dolch malt dir mit Pinselstrichen strahlenden Schmerzes weitere Symbole auf die Stirn. Dein Blut ist kochendes Blei. Deine Nerven sind vergiftete Angelleinen. Jeder deiner Atemzüge zerfetzt deine Kehle wie einhundert Rasierklingen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La dague continue de graver des symboles sur votre front, chaque trait provoquant en vous des spasmes de douleur incandescente. Votre sang n'est plus que du plomb en fusion, et vos veines des câbles empoisonnés. Chacune de vos inspirations taillade votre gorge telle des centaines de fines lames aiguisées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dagger draws more symbols on your forehead with strokes of incandescent pain. Your blood is boiling lead. Your nerves are poisoned wires. Your every breath shreds your throat like a hundred razor blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La dague continue de graver des symboles sur votre front, chaque trait provoquant en vous des spasmes de douleur incandescente. Votre sang n'est plus que du plomb en fusion ; vos veines sont des lignes de pêche empoisonnées. Chacune de vos inspirations taillade votre gorge telles des centaines de fines lames aiguisées.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hançer, alnına yeni semboller çizerken her darbede müthiş acılar yaşatıyor. Kanın âdeta kurşun gibi kaynıyor. Damarların, zehirli kablolar sanki. Verdiğin her nefes, boğazını yüz tane tıraş bıçağı gibi kesiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dagger draws more symbols on your forehead with strokes of incandescent pain. Your blood is boiling lead. Your nerves are poisoned wires. Your every breath shreds your throat like a hundred razor blades.{/n}
